short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Never ask your fellow students for links and codes again!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save your own name, BBB links and codes, so this add-on can navigate you to the saved link and fills out the code and name field automatically for you, all with one click. 
The saved data will then be available on all your devices where you are logged in with your google account.

You can also easily share all your room information by using the new import export functions or by right clicking on one of your saved rooms and copying the room data directly to your clipboard.
